Original:
10訪以上台北最愛酒吧，沒有之一。
在條通佇立10年以上的神店，推薦各酒友、甚至不常喝酒的朋友去也都獲得一致好評！！

各種水果調酒（榴槤、蘋果、香蕉、橘子、柿子...等，隨季節更換）非常厲害，新穎的風味，平衡的酒感，同水果也可以選擇不同的基酒與風味，懂酒與不懂酒的人都可以喝得很開心。

經典調酒的平衡感也是抓得穩穩的，絕不踩雷！！新上線的茶酒單點了三杯，品質一樣優秀，並且有全新的味覺感受，令人佩服!

BTW，7th的餐點也是一絕，雖然上菜極慢，但味道是一流的。是台北少數酒、食俱佳的酒吧！（推薦真的很慢的慢慢等章魚燒）

不像大部份的日式調酒吧，規矩一堆，也不用人擠人一直排隊，就是愜意的氛圍，適合與朋友小酌、一人下班後單獨放鬆的好地方。
EN:
10 Visit the most favorite bar in Taipei, none of them.
In the magic shop that has been standing for more than 10 years, it is recommended that all wine friends and even friends who do not even drink often get unanimous praise!Intersection

Various fruits (durian, apple, banana, oranges, persimmons, etc., change with the season) are very powerful, novel flavor, balanced wine, can also choose different base wines and flavors with fruits, understand Alcohol and people who don't understand wine can drink very well.

The sense of balance of classic bartending is also stable, never step on the thunder!IntersectionThe newly launched tea wine was ordered for three cups. The quality is as good as the quality, and has a new sense of taste, which is admirable!

BTW, 7th's meal is also a must. Although it is very slow, the taste is first -class.It is a few bars with good wine and food in Taipei!(Recommended really slowly, wait for octopus burning)

Unlike most Japanese -style bartenders, there are a lot of rules, and no one is squeezed by people. It is a pleasant atmosphere. It is suitable for a good place for drinking with friends and relaxing alone after get off work.

Original:
林森北路商圈為數不多的純喝酒酒吧，而且竟然有貓貓，超開心超驚喜(/ω＼)

一進門要先去洗手，坐定之後會給毛巾擦手，很日式的服務
男店員很親切，還跟我們說要怎麼分辨這一帶的酒吧，來喝酒還可以學習日文，是不是很棒（笑）

店內空間不大，一個吧台以及三桌沙發位，都蠻好坐的～其中一半是吸菸區，有用空氣清淨機區隔開來。
剛好那天的客人不多，待在這裡我覺得很放鬆耶～感覺約朋友或獨自一人都很可以

今天點的兩杯都是以威士忌為基底的調酒，old fashioned 和penicillin ，各是$450元
店員邊調酒邊仔細的介紹，Old fashioned 用的是來自美國的波本威士忌，原料、味道和香氣都和平常喝到的蘇格蘭威士忌不一樣，順順的好喝
第二杯點了熟悉的penicillin ，可這杯我之前喝到的太好喝了，相較之下就覺得普通

低消500，可刷卡但就要加一成，所以記得多領點現金來(/ω＼)
EN:
There are few pure drink bars on the business district of Linsen North Road, and there are cats.

When you enter the door, go to wash your hands first. After sitting, you will wipe your hands on the towel.
The male clerk is very kind, and told us how to distinguish the bar in this area. You can learn Japanese when you drink and drink.

The space in the store is not large. One bar and three tables of sofa are quite easy to sit ~ Half of which is the smoking area, and the use of air purifiers is separated.
There are not many guests that day, I feel very relaxed here ~ I feel that I can ask friends or alone.

The two cups of today are bartender based on whiskey, Old Fashioned and Penicillin, each of which is $ 450 yuan
The clerk carefully introduced while adjusting the wine, Old Fashioned used Buben whiskey from the United States. The raw materials, taste and aroma are different from the Scottish whiskey that you often drink.
The second cup ordered the familiar Penicillin, but the cup I drank too much before, and I felt ordinary in comparison.

Low low 500, you can swipe the card, but you need to add one to one percent, so remember
